plans.name: Pay-As-You-Go
plans.description: The Breeze Pay-As-You-Go plan requires a minimum purchase of $6 + tax to initiate a prepaid balance on the account. The prepaid balance is reduced at the rate of $0.10 per minute for riding time, all other overage fees that exceed an account holder's prepaid balance will be billed within 7 days.

plans.name: Monthly Plus
plans.description: The Monthly plus plan includes 60 minutes of rental time each calendar day for 30 days. Additional minutes are charged at the Pay As You Go rate of $0.10/minute. All other fees and credits are described in the Rental Policy. Thank you for riding Breeze.

plans.name: Monthly Basic
plans.description: The Monthly Basic plan includes 30 minutes of rental time each calendar day for 30 days. Additional minutes are charged at the Pay As You Go rate of $0.10/minute. All other fees and credits are described in the Rental Policy. Thank you for riding Breeze.

plans.name: Annual Plus
plans.description: The Annual Plus plan includes 60 minutes of rental time each calendar day. Additional minutes are charged at the Pay As You Go rate of $0.10/minute. All other fees and credits are described in the Rental Policy. Thank you for riding Breeze.

plans.name: Annual Basic
plans.description: The Annual Basic plan includes 30 minutes of rental time each calendar day. Additional minutes are charged at the Pay As You Go rate of $0.10/minute. All other fees and credits are described in the Rental Policy. Thank you for riding Breeze.

plans.name: SMC Students
plans.description:
This plan is for students of Santa Monica College.  SMC ID Numbers will be validated on a recurring basis.

The SMC Students plan includes 60 minutes of rental time each calendar day. Additional minutes are charged at the Pay As You Go rate of $0.10/minute. Please read the Rental Policy for details about all other fees and credits. Thank you for riding Breeze.
